articles.title: Google Apps Summit 2025 spotlights Vietnam as APAC growth engine
articles.description: Vietnam leads Asia-Pacific in app and gaming revenue growth, hosts inaugural Google Apps Summit focusing on AI adoption and developer success.
articles.content: Google concluded its first-ever regional Google Apps Summit 2025 in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam, combining three major events for over 700 developers across Asia-Pacific. Vietnam showed 65% app revenue growth in 2024 with over 6 billion app downloads, mainly from international users, generating billions in export revenue and jobs. The summit emphasized AI tools like Gemini API as key to accelerating development, with 90% of global game developers using AI workflows. Google also launched a 12-week Apps Accelerator program for early-stage startups in the region. The Asia-Pacific region is projected to lead a $750 billion global app economy by 2030.
articles.author: Various
